Text:
The tunes from Carnival Of Souls will never happen. 
Would be awesome if they played the whole Sonic Boom CD though.
worst fake live cd I've ever heard!!!!

I agree...absolutely the worst fake I've seen in some time. They haven't even started the European Tour yet!! Thanks for making a compilation of the North American Tour though. Next time, label it as such. :)
Here is a real Live Album from the Tour, no Fake: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5572857/KISS_-_Sonic_Boom_Over_Europe_-_Live_in_Zurich_-_16.05.2010
